title: Jazz - Stan Kenton, Bob Graettinger 1943-53
description:
Jazz - Stan Kenton, Bob Graettinger 1943-53

Innovations Orchestra 1950
During 1950-51, Stan Kenton did the unthinkable by putting together a 40-piece orchestra that included a full string section. The music was quite uncommercial, complex, and advanced with the emphasis on the arrangements rather than the soloists.

City Of Glass 1951, This Modern World 51-53 - Bob Graettinger
Bob Graettinger was one of the most radical arrangers around in the 1950s and it is doubtful whether any other jazz big-band leader other than Stan Kenton would have ever employed him. These performances are intense, very dense and quite scary. Recommended for open-eared listeners. 

01 Kenton - Artistry In Rhythm 1943-45
02 Kenton - Intermission Riff 1945-46
03 Kenton - Collaboration 1946-47
04 Kenton - Progressive Jazz 1947
05 Kenton - Innovations Orchestra 1950
06 Kenton - Innovations Orchestra 1950
07 Kenton with Bob Graettinger
08 Kenton - City Of Glass 1951 Bob Graettinger
09 Kenton - This Modern World 51-53 Bob Graettinger
